author: Lachlan Markay
title: Sanctioned Russian banks lose U.S. lobbyists
description: So far, seven U.S. lobbying and PR firms have parted ways with 10 different clients in the wake of punitive U.S. measures .
content:
Washington lobbying firms are dropping high-profile Russian clients targeted by U.S. sanctions this week, as restrictions limit business with those companies.
